Hero_sec: Freshly prepared, good coffee and food specialities.
seller_sec: A Flavor That Brings Us Together
discover_sec: Our story began with a simple passion for the aroma of coffee and grew into a complete experience that blends warmth, taste, and emotions in every cup. We live coffee in every detail—so it becomes part of your day, not just a drink
booking_confirm_explain: Click confirm to get your resevation done
booking_notes_place: Add anything you want to note ..
footer_about: A premium coffee spot in the heart of Dammam, serving freshly prepared desserts and carefully selected coffee for an unforgettable experience.
footer_address: Al Rayan, Dammam – Imam Ali Bin Abi Talib St
lumin_about1: From the heart of Dammam, in Al Rayan District, our story began with a simple passion for coffee — and grew into a complete experience that blends taste, comfort, and beautiful moments.We believe coffee is more than just a drink; it’s a lifestyle, a source of inspiration that gives your day a unique flavor.
lumin_about2: At Lumin Alsharq Café, we care about every detail — from selecting the finest coffee beans to crafting daily desserts with love — to offer you an experience that satisfies all your senses.Our place is designed to be a warm space for friends and families to gather, enjoy calm moments, or work over a cup of coffee that truly matches your mood.
lumin_about3: We promise to always stay true to what we believe in:Signature coffee. Memorable desserts.
